snippets.title: Hi!
snippets.description:
Welcome to simple snippet editor (snip.io)
Here you can create directories and snippets of course, snipio supports many languages markup through Prism.js.
All snippets saves on exit or via Ctrl + S. Have fun!
Repository: https://github.com/crackidocky/snip.io
